Question: Ohdoki Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ohdoki Inc

Oh! Vibrator

- Powered by sonic technology, utilizing ResoTouch technology for customizable vibrations
- Offers localized and deeper pleasure through sound waves
- Can sync with audio, video, and VR content using Bluetooth
- Can be controlled online from anywhere around the world or offline with easy controls
- Equipped with an integrated platform, The Handyverse, for remote control and synchronization with video content
- Available for purchase this spring on TheHandy.com and Amazon
- Pre-order price is $74.95, eventually doubling to $149.95
